name: Spirit Immemorial
description:
Spirit Immemorial is a third-person, narrative driven, collection based walking simulator following Ember Everstar, a Private Investigator in the magical town of Spiritsvale. With the help of her Will-o’-the-Wisp spirit companion, Kal, explore the Soulcore District of Spiritsvale, talk to and interact with the quirky townsfolk, and use Ember’s unique ability to seek out and return Ser Ander’s lost memories.

As Ember restores Anders' memories and helps solve the dilemmas of the other townsfolk, truths about Spiritsvale and its denizens will become clear to everyone for better or for worse.

This is a student Project created by Amy West, Jesus Saenz Martinez, Jordan Samel, Maple Hansen + collaborators.

The development time was 5.5 months in total. The project was made Using Unreal Engine 4.
